颪: (おろし) - Vento das Montanhas, vento soprando das montanhas
颯々: (さっさつ) - rustling (of wind); murmuring; whistling; soughing

颯と: (さっと) - quickly (esp. actions); suddenly (esp. wind, rain, etc.)

飛ばし: (とばし) - selling or divesting in unwanted stocks; hiding bad loans
飛ばす: (とばす) - to fly/to fire/to hurl/to launch/to make fly; to skip over/to omit/to drop (e.g. stitch); to run or drive fast/to gallop; to spread a rumour (rumor)/to tell a story/to tell a joke; to remove/to get rid of/to transfer; to attack/to jeer at

飛び回る: (とびまわる) - to fly about; to skip about; to bustle about

飛び込み自殺: (とびこみじさつ) - committing suicide by throwing oneself in front of an onrushing train

飛び退く: (とびのく) - to jump (out of the way); to jump back; to jump aside
